document.full_text: rex grossman doesn't have a contract to play with the washington redskins next season, but he still expects to be the team's starting qb.
document.title: rex grossman 'definitely' thinks he'll be redskins' starter
lines_and_colors: rex grossman doesn't have a contract to play with the washington redskins next season, but he still expects to be the team's starting qb.
